name: Hobitute Art and Media Services Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: art, handicrafts, art-learning, crafts, paintings, handicrafts-ecommerce
description: Specializes in art and craft area.
overview:
To become the world’s largest Art and Hobby Specialty Company that unleashes liveliness in people and provides unmatched market reach and research space for artists.

To facilitate accessible and affordable pursuit of art and hobbies by anyone, anywhere and anytime to catalyze self expression and experience of joy. To assist artists and artisans in rural area to discover their potential and entrepreneurial talent. Help them to setup and reach out to the world using Internet technologies. To offer quality artworks at best price for every customer. To impart Art education to each and every art lover. To facilitate global market reach for artists and artisans. To institute research in the area of various art forms. To offer platforms for the promotion of a variety of art, hobbies, and experiential training.
